about_the_game:
Welcome to Defense Duel! This is a real-time strategy game where you must position powerful cannons to stop the enemy onslaught and protect your lands.
Immerse yourself in an exciting world where every battle requires tactical skill and ingenuity.

Your goal is to create an impregnable defense using various cannons that will prevent enemies from advancing.
Each level presents a new tactical challenge, requiring you to carefully plan every placement of your weapons for maximum effectiveness.

Game Features:
Unique Style
Diverse Cannons
Intense Gameplay
detailed_description:
Welcome to Defense Duel! This is a real-time strategy game where you must position powerful cannons to stop the enemy onslaught and protect your lands.
Immerse yourself in an exciting world where every battle requires tactical skill and ingenuity.

Your goal is to create an impregnable defense using various cannons that will prevent enemies from advancing.
Each level presents a new tactical challenge, requiring you to carefully plan every placement of your weapons for maximum effectiveness.

Game Features:
Unique Style
Diverse Cannons
Intense Gameplay
name: Defense Duel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 (2 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defense Duel is an engaging strategic challenge where your cleverness and planning determine the outcome of each battle. Build your defenses, position your cannons, and secure your victory!
